data.name: My Retail Store
data.detailed_description:
This game is a unique combination of strategy and simulation game with some economic elements. Do your best to run a hardware store while making enough money to keep your shop open. Manage every aspect of your shop and use your skills to make your shop the best in the town!!

  • Complete control over YOUR shop! Buy product and set their price.
  • Buy hardware from different brands
  • A detailed management mode to neatly organise your empire. Purchase new tables!
  • Buy furniture and equipment
  • Decide every detail of tables to TVs and do whatever it takes to make your customers happy!
data.about_the_game:
This game is a unique combination of strategy and simulation game with some economic elements. Do your best to run a hardware store while making enough money to keep your shop open. Manage every aspect of your shop and use your skills to make your shop the best in the town!!

  • Complete control over YOUR shop! Buy product and set their price.
  • Buy hardware from different brands
  • A detailed management mode to neatly organise your empire. Purchase new tables!
  • Buy furniture and equipment
  • Decide every detail of tables to TVs and do whatever it takes to make your customers happy!
data.short_description: Ever wanted to run your retail store? Now you can! You play the role of an Artist who inherited a retail store. It is now your job to manage and handle day to day business of your store while pursuing your hobby of painting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 (8.1)/ 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 512 RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 (8.1)/ 10 64Bit
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz quad core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 1024 RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
